Such a special night for him and the whole organization,” said Flagg, who turned 19 in December. “I just feel blessed. The Mavericks rookie keeps looking more and more special, but it was the Hornets who took the win.
Flagg's 49 points are the most ever by a teenager in the NBA, but his former Duke roommate got the win.
titles: One for ages: Flagg nets 49; Knueppel scores win
Cooper Flagg scores 49 points, most ever by an NBA teenager, in Duke reunion with Kon Knueppel

constructiveness_reason: semantic: pos_sim=0.00, neg_sim=0.00; length_penalty=0.35 (<12 tokens)
summary: Kon Knueppel led the Hornets to their fifth consecutive win over the Mavericks, making key plays late in the game. Cooper Flagg scored 49 points, setting an NBA record for a teenager, but the Mavericks lost to the Hornets.
